results.title: Continuous extracorporeal clearance in metformin-associated lactic acidosis and metformin-induced lactic acidosis: a systematic review.

results.title: Methylene Blue in Metformin Intoxication: Not Just Rescue But Also Initial Treatment.
results.text_hl: We speculate that, considering the mechanisms of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@ @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ and the mechanisms of action of @CHEMICAL_Methylene_Blue @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008751 @@@MB@@@, it is suggested that early administration of @CHEMICAL_Methylene_Blue @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008751 @@@MB@@@, not only as a rescue treatment but as the initial approach to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Poisoning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011041 @@@poisoning@@@ in combination with other treatments, may result in improved outcomes.

citations.NLM: Katlan B. Methylene Blue in Metformin Intoxication: Not Just Rescue But Also Initial Treatment. Pediatr Emerg Care. 2024 Mar 13;():. PMID: 38471766
